description:
Syr Flova is a mysterious waitress working at the Benevolent Mistress.She is mysterious due that no one in the inn knows where she lives or why she sometimes skips work. She is normally acts kind but likes to tease Bell Carnel to get closer to him.
Syr in the past saved her colleage Lyu. Then on Lyu totally dedicated herself into protecting her and making her happy. Hermes was also oddly aware of the relationship between Lyu and Syr and used it to bait Lyu into joining the rescue expendition requested by Hestia to find Bell.
name: Syr Flover
